## DefaultApp.registerElementsTarget() method

API for Application and Seed authors to define dynamic [AppElement](./foundation-shell.appelement.md) integration points.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerElementsTarget(targetId: any, predicate: any, repeatOptions?: import("@microsoft/fast-element").RepeatOptions): import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<any, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targetId | any | [AppTargetId](./foundation-shell.apptargetid.md). |
|  predicate | any | Optional [AppElementPredicate](./foundation-shell.appelementpredicate.md). |
|  repeatOptions | import("@microsoft/fast-element").RepeatOptions | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate&lt;any, any&gt;

A  fragment that will stay in sync as elements are registered and deregistered.
